title: 4J Studios：Minecraft 主机版赢得TIGA年度最佳电子游戏奖
author: BensonQC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 _Benson_ 于 2014-11-8 17:52 编辑 



4J Studios：
Just won the TIGA award for Best Arcade Game 2014 for #MinecraftPS3 #MinecraftPS4 #MinecraftPSVita #MinecraftXbox1 !
#MinecraftPS3 #MinecraftPS4 #MinecraftPSVita #MinecraftXbox1 刚刚赢得了TIGA 2014年度最佳电子游戏奖！




4J Studios：
Just won another one. Thanks everyone who voted for us to win #TIGAawards Game of the Year.
刚刚赢得了另一个。感谢每个投票支持并使我们赢得TIGA年度最佳游戏奖的人。


原图:
